synopsis.text: This anime film provides a fresh perspective on a beloved story by retelling the main narrative from the viewpoint of Hiroto Suwa. Ten years after the tragic death of their friend Kakeru Naruse, Suwa and his wife Naho visit Mount Koubou with their old high school friends to view the cherry blossoms and reminisce about Kakeru. Overcome with regret, the group decides to write letters to their teenage selves in an attempt to rewrite the past. Now transported back in time, the 16-year-old Suwa has a chance to alter future events with the knowledge from his older self's letter. Will Suwa's choices lead to a new chain of events? What will unfold in this rewritten version of the future? With its innovative narrative angle and continuation of a cherished tale, this anime promises to offer both nostalgia and novelty to devoted fans eager to rediscover a poignant story.
